name: cordova-plugin-screen-orientation
description: Adds Screen Orientation API lock and unlock functions to the global screen object in android, iOS, WP8, W8.1, and BB10.

scripts.jshint: node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint www && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint src && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint demo/www

author: gbenvenuti
